channel.title: Now that one problem is out of the way, heres another
channel.description:
k, so when i typer ::npc 54 (black drag) when i attack it, i hit 0 and it dies, only leaving me with bones, why is this? and some items (lava cape etc.) when they spawn, i pick em up and they come in inven as noted tzahrr ket om.. any1 got info plz help.
Also there is only guards in the normal game, why? (not even everywhere)[br][size=1]Posted at: October 28, 2006, 03:46:48 PM[/size][hr]anyone know?
